entry.title: About fitting distributions to data
entry.summary: I explore some ideas about fitting a distribution to specific data.
entry.content:
The distributions in Data Science is

k-Means

Gaussian mixture models

$$Y_1 \sim \mathcal{N}(\mu_1,\,\sigma^{2}_1)\,. $$

and

$$Y_1 \sim \mathcal{N}(\mu_1,\,\sigma^{2}_1)\,. $$

Kernel Density Estimation
